categories: Category:Moffs and Grand Moffs of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ceptor was a Moff of the reconstituted Sith Empire who served during the Great Galactic War against the Galactic Republic. Ceptor oversaw the Battle of Rordak from a battlecruiser, but the Republic commander Bouris Ulgo personally boarded Ceptor's ship and captured it, ensuring a Republic victory.
